def main():
    t = int(input())
    for i in range(0, t):
        (a1, a2) = input().split()
        a1 = int(a1)
        a2 = int(a2)
        (b1, b2) = input().split()
        b1 = int(b1)
        b2 = int(b2)
        (c1, c2) = input().split()
        c1 = int(c1)
        c2 = int(c2)
        combo_a = a1 + a2
        combo_b = b1 + b2
        combo_c = c1 + c2
        if (combo_a >= combo_b) & (combo_a >= combo_c):
            print(combo_a)
        elif (combo_b >= combo_a) & (combo_b >= combo_c):
            print(combo_b)
        else:
            print(combo_c)
main()

        print(k)
    elif l >= k and l >= m:
        print(l)
    elif m > k and m > l:
        print(m)
